sentences.en: ...a professor of mathematics at Boston College.
sentences.cn: …一位波士顿大学的数学教授。

sentences.en: He did well in mathematics, but barely scraped through in chemistry.
sentences.cn: 他数学考得不错, 但化学只是勉强及格.

sentences.en: He has come out in front in the study of mathematics.
sentences.cn: 他在数学方面已名列前茅.

sentences.en: I'll help you with your mathematics if you're stuck.
sentences.cn: 你要是在数学方面遇到困难,我会来帮助你的.

sentences.en: Ingrid is currently teaching Mathematics at Shimla Public School.
sentences.cn: 英格丽德目前在希姆拉公立学校教数学。

sentences.en: It's ironical that the weakest student in mathematics was elected class treasurer.
sentences.cn: 数学最差的学生竟被选为班级财务干事,这真是具有讽刺意味.

sentences.en: Mathematics was once dubbed the handmaiden of the sciences.
sentences.cn: 数学曾一度被视为各门科学的基础。

sentences.en: Most of the students in this class are good at mathematics.
sentences.cn: 这个班的学生多半数学很好.

sentences.en: One in five young adults was struggling with everyday mathematics.
sentences.cn: 1/5的年轻人做日常的数学计算都费劲。

sentences.en: Professor White is looked upon as an authority on mathematics.
sentences.cn: 怀特教授被看成数学权威.

sentences.en: She is working at a difficult problem in mathematics.
Surprisingly, mathematics was voted their favourite subject.
sentences.cn: 令人惊讶的是，数学课被选为他们最喜欢的科目。

sentences.en: The core subjects are English, mathematics and science.
sentences.cn: 基础课是英文、数学和科学。

sentences.en: The degree provides a thorough grounding in both mathematics and statistics.
sentences.cn: 该学位课程将为数学和统计学打下扎实的基础。

sentences.en: We had a very good mathematics mistress who pulled me up.
sentences.cn: 我们有个很出色的女数学老师，她帮我提高了水平。

words.tran_cn: 数学的，数学上的；精确的

trans.tran_en: the science of numbers and of shapes, including  algebra  ,  geometry  , and  arithmetic
